moviesDatabase.title: The Wisdom of Trauma
moviesDatabase.description: Mental illness, suicide, drug overdose, and autoimmune disorders are interconnected epidemics affecting 1 in 5 Americans annually, according to Dr Gabor Maté.

moviesDatabase.title: Living with Leopards 2024
moviesDatabase.description: A nature documentary that follows two leopard cubs as they make the journey from infancy into adulthood.

moviesDatabase.title: The Doomsday Cult of Antares De La Luz 2024
moviesDatabase.description: Years after being charged with a heinous crime, former members of a Chilean cult share their haunting experiences.

moviesDatabase.title: Piranha 3D 2010
moviesDatabase.description: After a sudden underwater tremor sets free scores of the prehistoric man-eating fish, an unlikely group of strangers must band together to stop themselves from becoming fish food for the area's new razor-toothed residents.
